Hello, my name is Ruben Gutierrez. I am a Web Developer and Designer located in the Orange County, California area.

Check Out My Work

Portfolio→

About:

I've been building websites for 3 years and enjoy creating and designing tools that help people best communicate their ideas to the world. Away from the computer, I enjoy exercising and hanging out with my friends, and most importantly spending time with my family. I mainly post my design work on Behance and am currently available for freelance work.

Services:

Website Design

Web Design involves creating the layout for the website. After deciding the content of your website. I begin designing the structure to create a visually appealing and functional user interface.

Front End Development

Front End Development is the technical process of constructing the final visual design for a web page. Utilizing the building blocks of the web HTML, CSS, and Javascript I bring the designers visual ideas to life in the web browser. This also include working with Content Management Systems like Wordpress.

Are you intrested in working on a project?
